metadata.title: CVE-2022-4095 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in Linux kernel before 5.19.2. This issueoccurs in cmd_hdl_filter in drivers/staging/rtl8712/rtl8712_cmd.c, allowingan attacker to launch a local denial of service attack and gain escalationof privileges.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
